# GP/Management Company Formation Checklist
## Delaware LLC Formation Steps

---

## FORMATION CHECKLIST

### Step 1: Choose Entity Name
- [ ] Name available with Delaware Division of Corporations
- [ ] Name ends with "LLC," "L.L.C.," or "Limited Liability Company"
- [ ] Check: https://icis.corp.delaware.gov/ecorp/entitysearch/namesearch.aspx

Suggested naming convention:
- Management Company: `[Fund Name] Advisors, LLC`
- GP: `[Fund Name] GP, LLC`
- Fund: `[Fund Name] LP`

---

### Step 2: Appoint Registered Agent
Required by Delaware Code § 18-104

**Options:**
| Provider | Annual Cost | Website |
|----------|-------------|---------|
| CSC (Corporation Service Company) | $300 | cscglobal.com |
| CT Corporation | $300 | wolterskluwer.com |
| Harvard Business Services | $50 | delawareinc.com |
| Registered Agents Inc. | $100 | registeredagentsinc.com |

---

### Step 3: File Certificate of Formation
**File with:** Delaware Division of Corporations  
**Cost:** $90 (standard)  
**Processing:** 24 hours (expedited: $50-$1,000)

**Required Information:**
- LLC name
- Registered agent name and address

**Online Filing:** https://corp.delaware.gov/paymentsub/

---

### Step 4: Obtain EIN
**File:** IRS Form SS-4 (online)  
**Cost:** Free  
**Website:** https://www.irs.gov/businesses/small-businesses-self-employed/apply-for-an-employer-identification-number-ein-online

---

### Step 5: Draft Operating Agreement
Not filed with state, but legally essential.

**Key Provisions:**
- Member names and ownership percentages
- Capital contributions
- Profit/loss allocation
- Management structure (member-managed vs manager-managed)
- Distribution policies
- Transfer restrictions
- Dissolution procedures

See: `/docs/templates/llc_operating_agreement.md`

---

### Step 6: Delaware Annual Franchise Tax
**Due:** June 1 each year  
**Cost:** $300 for LLCs  
**Pay online:** https://corp.delaware.gov/paytaxes/

---

## REGULATORY REFERENCES

| Requirement | Delaware Code Citation |
|-------------|----------------------|
| Certificate of Formation | 6 Del. C. § 18-201 |
| Registered Agent | 6 Del. C. § 18-104 |
| Operating Agreement | 6 Del. C. § 18-101(7) |
| Registered Office | 6 Del. C. § 18-104(a)(2) |
| Annual Tax | 6 Del. C. § 18-1107 |

---

## LINKS

- Delaware Division of Corporations: https://corp.delaware.gov
- LLC Formation Guide: https://corp.delaware.gov/howtoform/
- Name Search: https://icis.corp.delaware.gov
